mapper.sql: id, order_id AS orderId, fans_corrency AS fansCorrency, integral, coupon, have_term AS haveTerm, money, buy_time AS buyTime, buy_mode AS buyMode, term_id AS termId, bus_id AS busId, member_id AS memberId, discount, buy_status AS buyStatus, receivables_number AS receivablesNumber
mapper.select: select r.id, r.order_id as "orderId", r.fans_corrency as "fansCorrency", r.integral as "integral", r.coupon as "coupon", r.have_term as "haveTerm", r.money as "money", r.buy_time as "buyTime", r.buy_mode as "buyMode", r.term_id as "termId", r.buy_status as "buyStatus", r.receivables_number as "receivablesNumber", r.bus_id as "busId", r.member_id as "memberId", r.discount as "discount", t.term_money as "termMoney" from purchase_receivables r left join purchase_term t on t.id=r.term_id where r.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and buy_status=1
